narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: D & D Services INC is a Home Health provider based in Tulsa, OK. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $119.3M in Medicaid payments across 367K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $119.3M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,907 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
